snippet.title: Into The Inferno Gameplay Demo June 2024
snippet.description:
A gameplay demo of the Into The Inferno retro-style dungeon crawler (DRPG) recorded at the end of June 2024. Watch the party traverse the wilderness and the dungeons fighting monsters in this retro-style RPG in the vein of The Bard's Tale, Wizardry, and Might and Magic. The game is currently available on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2462840/Into_The_Inferno/

Background music is "Wilderness" by Bloodless Mushroom from the game's soundtrack.
